Package engine

Class Strategy

java.lang.Object
engine.Strategy
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConstantStrategy, FlipStrategy, GreedyStrategy, InverseGreedyStrategy, MixedStrategy
public abstract class Strategy extends Object
Provides an abstract representation of a bidding strategy. Subclasses of this class must define their own implementation of the determineBid(BotState, BotState) method. This class also provides utility methods for calculating and updating bid sizes.

    • determineBid

      public abstract int determineBid(BotState playerState, BotState otherState)
      Determines the bid amount based on the states of the player and the opponent.
      Parameters:
      playerState - The state of the player bot.
      otherState - The state of the opponent bot.
      Returns:
      The amount to be bid by the player bot.

    • calculateBidSize

      protected int calculateBidSize(BotState playerState)
      Calculates the bid size based on the player's available resources.
      Parameters:
      playerState - The state of the player bot.
      Returns:
      The calculated bid size.

    • updateBidSize

      protected void updateBidSize(BotState playerState)
      Updates the bid size for the strategy based on the player's current state.
      Parameters:
      playerState - The state of the player bot.

    • init

      public Strategy init(BotState playerState, BotState otherState)
      Initializes the strategy with given states of the player and opponent. Also updates the bid size based on the player's state.
      Parameters:
      playerState - The state of the player bot.
      otherState - The state of the opponent bot.
      Returns:
      The initialized strategy.
